description.text: This submodule models network elements composing a NetDev, like ports, queues, and tables

reference.text: RFC 7950 - The YANG 1.1 Data Modeling Language

description.text: Connects to the NetDevResource models a network element composed of others, such as ports including various queues
Reflects the relationship between NetDevResourceSettings and the NetDevResource
Attaches the NetDevResourceStatistics with the NetDevResource
Allows to identify the type of network element composing the NetDev
